full_threads.body: got it, @heath

Hi Sacha, 

Sure, confirming we have added the new homepage slider and also slowed them down.

Heath,

Sorry - one other thing I meant to add. Could the time between slide changes on that front page be extended slightly? Even if its just for the first slide? Not sure if that's possible.

TVM.

Regards,

Sacha Heaney Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186

Great, thanks Heath.

Lets get this live! Are you also able to add a link to this on the home page (as part of the existing 'slideshow'). Please make it the first slide when you open the website.

Heading: "Leading Solutions in Challenging Times" ('READ MORE' in the small box below)

Background picture: attached

Thanks again. Any questions, let me know.

Regards,

Sacha Heaney Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186
@heath Logged 1:20 to Harvest for a total of 2 hours for this ticket.
@jona please add a total of 2 hrs for this task. Note, you have already logged some time below.

Hi Sasha, 

Sure glad you like it! Confirming we have now completed the below items as well: 
https://aspeninteriors.com.au/leading-solutions-in-challenging-times/

Hi Heath, Thanks very much for this - looks great. Just a couple of changes and additions below and then we will get it live ASAP!
  • Clip Together Desks: Please change name to 'Flat Pack Desk' and update the brochure to the one attached (slightly different).
  • Please add in a couple of extra rows below what you already have to fit the following products too:
    • Washable Computer Accessories (SealShield brochure attached. I have also attached the nurse image so you can use this as the focus image on the main page)
    • School Sanitiser Stations (flyer attached and a 'display pic' for the main page)
    • Sign In Sanitiser Stands (flyer attached and a 'display pic' for the main page).
Any questions, please let me know. Thank you. Regards, Sacha Heaney Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186

Hi Sacha,

Thanks for your patience with this task, confirming we have made the updates: https://aspeninteriors.com.au/leading-solutions-in-challenging-times/

We can add in the hand sanitiser and other products as they become available.

action.text: Heath Maguire changed the customer to Sacha Heaney | Aspen Interiors

full_threads.body:
Hi Sacha,

Thanks for your patience with this request. We are currently working the changes and will have an update for you this afternoon/tomorrow morning at the latest.

Speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

Just checking in that the below all made sense? Look forward to hearing back from you.

Regards,

Sacha Heaney Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186

Hi Heath, Thanks for sending that through. The overall layout looks great. My apologies if I was unclear about the 'call to action' in my first email. I am always guilty of having things all laid out in my head but not communicating well! We want the products we are promoting to be the main feature, with the old project images used as a bit of backup, or 'scene-setting'. I really like the collage look, and think it is sustainable as we add more products etc. See attached (very rough) image of how I am imagining we could incorporate the products as well. Could the image act as a link that then takes the user through to the PDF brochure of that particular product? So far we have:
  • Working from Home furniture packages (3 types of desks)
  • Clip together desks (2 sizes)
  • Washable Keyboards and Mice
  • Aspen 4 Step 'Back to Work' package (brochure attached)
  • Hand Sanitiser Stands for Worksites/Schools (images/brochures coming soon)
I hope this helps somewhat. If you need more information, please let me know. Thanks again for your help! Regards, Sacha Heaney Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186

Hi Sacha, 

We have created the first draft of the page for you. 

I think we need to build in a strong call to action, i.e. do we want to push the flat pack tables etc. Or if it's just general and informational, then we need to highlight the specific message(s) we want the visitor to takeaway. 

Here is the link: https://aspeninteriors.com.au/leading-solutions-in-challenging-times/
yes @heath i got them from the message thread
Logged 40 mins to Harvest

@glen looking Good! 

Are you able to use the images and pdf that was in the zip folder I linked below?

hi @heath
please check this page https://aspeninteriors.com.au/leading-solutions-in-challenging-times/

madam @jona  40mins

thank you
got this, @heath
@glen

@glen can you please create a new page on aspeninteriors.com.au

With the copy:

Title:
Leading Solutions in Challenging Times

Copy:
> Here at Aspen Interiors, we hold a firm belief that as individuals, as a company, and as part of the wider community, each of us can turn a difficult situation into an opportunity to grow, learn, and become better people.

> We are committed as a team to not let the current Health crisis restrict our creativity or limit our resolve to provide the best possible service to our clients and others we have to do with every day. For this reason, we are supporting individuals, companies and governments Australia-wide with medical supplies and furniture solutions.

Images and PDF download:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/egsbpcqh7weetqv/OneDrive_2020-04-14.zip?dl=0

Thanks!!

Hi Heath,

My apologies for taking so long to reply!

See below a blurb to begin with – once I show the directors the mock-ups, they may choose different wording, or create their own as more of a ‘Message from the Directors’ – hope that won’t be an issue, I would just prefer to run everything past them in one go than bother them with the finer details at this point! We will definitely want some kind of written ‘response’ included near the top though, so we will work with this one for now.

“Here at Aspen Interiors, we hold a firm belief that as individuals, as a company, and as part of the wider community, each of us can turn a difficult situation into an opportunity to grow, learn, and become better people.
We are committed as a team to not let the current Health crisis restrict our creativity or limit our resolve to provide the best possible service to our clients and others we have to do with every day. For this reason, we are supporting individuals, companies and governments Australia-wide with medical supplies and furniture solutions.”

See below a link to some images/flyers of the products we have underway at the moment, as well as some project photos of work we have previously done in hospitals/medical centres etc. which could be included, to give some context to this new branch of products, and remind people that we have done work in the field before etc.

https://aspen365-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/personal/sacha_aspeninteriors_com_au/EmnyOsDpF8VOsY4xJZuqm1YBS7RMgFeGDoVBzkFelQ0HDA?e=zEepLr <https://aspen365-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/personal/sacha_aspeninteriors_com_au/EmnyOsDpF8VOsY4xJZuqm1YBS7RMgFeGDoVBzkFelQ0HDA?e=zEepLr>

It’s not a ‘blog’ as such, but more of a landing place for our new ideas and initiatives in relation to C-19. We want to be able to include links to this page (or downloads within this page) in our LinkedIn/EDM marketing etc.

Sorry that the above is fairly scattered – I trust this is enough to work with for now, and I will pass on anything more that I am provided too.

Please contact me any time with questions, or if you need more details or information. I look forward to your suggestions – thank you!

Regards,

Sacha Heaney Sales Support aspeninteriors.com.au <http://aspeninteriors.com.au/> T 61 2 9854 6800 <tel:+61298546800> T 1800 646 186 <tel:1800646186>




From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Friday, 3 April 2020 9:23 AM
To: Sacha Heaney | Aspen Interiors <sacha@aspeninteriors.com.au <mailto:sacha@aspeninteriors.com.au>>
Subject: Re: New Website page

Hi Sacha,

This all sounds great and very needed at the moment.

We can work them into the website no problems. Once you have some imagery and content, I can do some mock ups for you to review.

Depending on quantity of products and a few other factors I will form up the best way to present and market them through the site.

Thanks and speak soon,
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwolfiq.com.au&c=E,1,t8nWT2d8Y8t9A8oF9QatbAkLbxAoFq1F_1UHzwNx3-tqFsTs4pXX3o5HUytXgpgX6dYSVOjOIx2fO6H0CzvC8ScCmWDOSKD9o9rKp9EEZ6-CPM8j1IYHi7k,&typo=1>

On 3 Apr 2020, at 9:12 am, Sacha Heaney | Aspen Interiors <sacha@aspeninteriors.com.au <mailto:sacha@aspeninteriors.com.au>> wrote:

Good Morning Heath,

I hope you and those close to you are staying healthy and safe during this crazy time!

Aspen have started some extra projects and products in response to Covid-19, and we are wanting to add a page to our website to highlight this, where we can put updates and information related to how we are supporting health services/government etc., as well as those working from home.

For example, we have launched some medical grade washable keyboards/mice to supply hospitals, we are potentially accessing Santisiers etc., for our customers, and we are working on quick-assembly desks/beds etc etc. We have quite a few of the team working on these new opportunities, so we will no doubt have more products emerging as we move forward.

Could you let me know what you require from me to get a page started online? It would be great to have it on the homepage of the website as well, with a ‘Read More’ link to a full page of info/pics/brochures etc.

If you have some ideas on how the design/layout would work that would be great.

Look forward to hearing back from you – thank you.

Regards,

Sacha Heaney
Sales Support
